Tonight, Tues., Oct. 10: Learn about your voting rights, the voting process, and new exciting voting rights reforms in Mississippi.
  


Voting Rights Workshop

Tuesday, October 10, 6-8 p.m.
County Courthouse
Circuit Courtroom, 2nd Floor
300 S First St.
Brookhaven, MS 39601

LEARN MORE ON FACEBOOK

Your vote, your voice

Voting is fundamental to our democracy. A more democratic society – one that empowers all of us to participate in a system that is fair and efficient – is a stronger one.

Join us and the Lincoln County Circuit Clerk's Office tonight, Tuesday, October 10 for our Voting Rights Workshop.

Learn about your voting rights, the voting process, and new exciting voting rights reforms in Mississippi. Topics will include affidavit ballots, absentee voting, early voting, online registration, and more! There will also be a Know Your Rights training on everything you need to know about how, when, and where you can vote and what to do if you are denied access to the ballot box.

This free workshop will answer your voting questions, introduce you to your local election officials, and inform you of your voting rights. Refreshments will be provided.

Visit our Facebook event page for the latest updates. Let's work together to expand access to the ballot!

See you tonight!
